metadata.Title: CVE-2023-28450 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Dnsmasq before 2.90. The default maximum EDNS.0 UDP packet size was set to 4096 but should be 1232 because of DNS Flag Day 2020.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-28450` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dnsmasq - 2.79-1ubuntu0.7
dnsmasq-base - 2.79-1ubuntu0.7
dnsmasq-base-lua - 2.79-1ubuntu0.7
dnsmasq-utils - 2.79-1ubuntu0.7
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: dnsmasq package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.79-1ubuntu0.7').
